title: One-Bedroom Apartment in a Great Petaluma Location! Easy Hwy Access!
posting_body: ['A Higher Quality of Living', 'CALL:', 'show contact info', 'x962', '$2,615 - $2,775', '.', '1 Bed 1 Bath .', '762 Sq.Ft', '* Unit 319 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 317 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 306 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 117 - Available 09/08/22', 'Altura', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Address:', '1113 Baywood Drive Petaluma, CA 94954', 'Want more information?', '<URL>', 'show contact info', '/floorplan/7434915/1?extnId=9612668', 'DESCRIPTION', 'A wide array of exceptional features and amenities awaits you when you choose this one-bedroom, one-bathroom model at Altura Apartments!', 'Showcase your culinary skills using the stainless steel appliances.', 'You will love the quartz countertops in the wraparound kitchen.', 'Select, third-floor models may also include a cozy fireplace.', 'To keep the bedroom organized, a large walk-in closet is available.', 'Reward yourself after a long day at work by taking a dip in the community’s saltwater pool.', 'Make your weekends more fun with a cookout at the outdoor fire pit with grilling areas.', 'Staying in shape is simple with a daily workout in the state-of-the-art fitness center.', 'Schedule a tour today to learn more about the community and explore the exciting Petaluma neighborhood!', 'FLOORPLAN/UNIT\u2002 \u2002FEATURES', 'USB Outlets', 'Stainless Steel Appliances: Microwave, Gas Range and Energy Star Refrigerator and Dishwasher', 'Soft Close Cabinets', 'Quartz Countertops', 'Pendant Lights', 'Modern Kitchen', 'In-Home Washer & Dryer', 'High Speed Fiber Internet', 'Faux Wood Blinds', 'Dual Paned Windows', 'Central Heating and Air Condit', 'Electric Fireplaces - 3rd Floor', 'LEASE\u2002\u2002TERMS', '12,13', 'OFFICE\u2002 \u2002HOURS', 'Monday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Tuesday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Wednesday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Thursday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Friday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Saturday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Sunday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x962', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
